channel.title: X10 Prayer Points
channel.description: I'm not sure if this is server or client sided so please let me know if it is in the wrong section. I am trying to add x10 Prayer so instead of it saying in the orb 99 it would say 990 like my hp. Which file or files would i edit to change it?

item.title: X10 Prayer Points
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

I did and it didn’t work with your code but i did mine and it looks like this:

[code]case 5:
sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[5] * 10 + “”, 7167);
sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) * 10 + “”, 7168);

		sendFrame126("" +c.playerLevel[5]+"/"+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5])+"", 687);//Prayer frame
		break[/code]

I added the * 10 part and it worked but is there a way to make my prayer go down by like 1 or 2 everytime like RS does instead of my prayer going down by 10 everytime.

Read full topic

item.title: X10 Prayer Points
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Did you save and compile? Because it will work.

Read full topic

item.title: X10 Prayer Points
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

I did that but when i tried it my prayer orb stays at 99 and my prayer is 95 and its not 950 and in the prayer orb its 99 not 990

Read full topic

item.title: X10 Prayer Points
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

It can be both, but it’s easier to do it server sided. Go into PlayerAssistant.java and search for: public void refreshSkill(int i) { And find case 5: and replace yours with mine: case 5: sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[5] * 10 + "", 4012); sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) * 10 + "", 4013); sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[5] * 10 + "", 4068); sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) + 1) + "", 4069); sendFrame126("" +c.playerLevel[5] * 10 +"/"+getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) * 10 +"", 687);//Prayer frame break;

Read full topic
